mapper.update: update quan_account_future set exchange_id = #{exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_source_id = #{accountSourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, accounts_type = #{accountsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accounts_name = #{accountsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, account_source_id, accounts_type, accounts_name, state from quan_account_future
